document_data.name: ''Poisoner's Gloves''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Poisoner's gloves''''' were [[enchanted]] gloves that strengthened the [[poison]] damage dealt by the wearer.
document_data.Description: These simple [[leather]] gloves appeared clean and well-cared for. However, they had a strong, cold, acrid smell.
document_data.Powers: ''Poisoner's gloves'' possessed a type of ''envenom'' enchantment that turned any poison damage dealt by the wearer, be it of magic [[spell]], or simple [[weapon]] coating nature, into an affliction, possibly rendering the target weakened and afflicted by the poison.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, a pair of ''poisoner's gloves'' was kept in [[Malus Thorm]]'s office in the [[House of Healing]], within the deadly [[Shadow-cursed Lands]].
